code: @Override protected void doHealthCheck(Health.Builder builder) throws Exception {     long diskFreeInBytes = this.path.getUsableSpace().     if (diskFreeInBytes >= this.threshold.toBytes()) {         builder.up().     } else {         logger.warn(String.format("Free disk space below threshold. " + "Available: %d bytes (threshold: %s)", diskFreeInBytes, this.threshold)).         builder.down().     }     builder.withDetail("total", this.path.getTotalSpace()).withDetail("free", diskFreeInBytes).withDetail("threshold", this.threshold.toBytes()). }
